question.content:
**Which number line model represents the expression $2.5+4.5$?**  


[[☃ radio 1]]

choices.content: ![A number line with 18 evenly spaced ticks from negative 8 to 8 in increments of 1. An arrow from 0 to 2.5 points 2.5 units to the right. Another arrow above it from 2.5 to 7 points 4.5 units to the right. Dotted lines connect the end of the arrowheads to the respective points on the number line. ](web+graphie://ka-perseus-graphie.s3.amazonaws.com/36e26ee668b5450eb0e29e87daa191864c6948dc)
